info.author: Norman J. Harman Jr.
info.description:
KLM inhouse Python Packages

CONTENTS::
 Subpackages
  - cheetah     Cheetah Template Engine extensions
  - wx          wxPython extensions
  - util        Python extensions
  - dotin       distutil package creation tools

 Part of distribution but not KLM module:
  - runall.py         unittest runner
  - test/basetest.py  unittest extenstions

USAGE::
  from KLM.util import *

  import KLM
  KLM.foo

  # dotin (usefull only in 'setup.in.py' really)
  from KLM.dotin import *

HISTORY::
   0.3.4 - added KLMOptionParser NullStream 

TODO::
  - write unittests, :(
  - add doco on installing dummy X server for wxPython


BUGS & LIMITATIONS::
  - perfect in every way

info.html_description:
KLM inhouse Python Packages

CONTENTS::
Subpackages
  • cheetah Cheetah Template Engine extensions
  • wx wxPython extensions
  • util Python extensions
  • dotin distutil package creation tools
Part of distribution but not KLM module:
  • runall.py unittest runner
  • test/basetest.py unittest extenstions
USAGE::

from KLM.util import *

import KLM KLM.foo

# dotin (usefull only in ‘setup.in.py’ really) from KLM.dotin import *

HISTORY::
0.3.4 - added KLMOptionParser NullStream
